title: [Large-scale] Developing Digital Comic Learning Media Based on Sasak Regional Wisdom

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and general understanding of local culture
context.additional_context: Social studies-linked learning using digital comics in a BYOD environment, emphasizing project-based activities that explore the integration of local traditional values and modern technology.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three core values of Sasak regional wisdom and their modern applications.
Learners can complete one storyboard based on local culture using digital comic creation tools.
Learners can evaluate the educational effectiveness of conveying local culture through digital comics with over 80% accuracy.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
